Text: hellohi there greetings from rainy and cold London where people are still wearing wool turtlenecks at the middle of may question for ya repo wiht Goldman Sachs can we do it thanks derek

JP MorganGoldman Sachs Repos of US TreasuriesForwarded by Derek LeeEUEnron on PM Edmund CT PM To Derek nron cc Simon CT Subject JP MorganGoldman Sachs Repos of US Treasuries Derek Following our earlier conversation the GMRA with JP Morgan Securities Ltd does not currently provide for trading repos on US Securities The GMRA with Goldman Sachs International does Regards Emdund
hiplease check voice mail regarding GS US repo docs thanks Derek

Goldman Sach repo docs Cc I left u a voice mail and email weeks ago regarding the status of the Goldman docs I havent seen a reply from you but as I remember from speaking to you last time the ball is esssentially in our court Can u tell me what is up In the meantime I cant do any US credit biz with GS and it is a MAJOR problem regards Derek
Re Goldman Sach repo docsit is between ECL and GS Co but GS s Gail shandley sent over the docs to you

Re Goldman Sach repo docs Cc I have been dealing with GSI in Euros for a month now There is no problem there However for me to deal in US with GS ECL must have another ISMA in place with GSCo I cannot do UStransactions right now based on what I have between ECL and GSI and GSI will not finance US and US treasury repos That has to be done by GS Co I thought you were aware of these differences thanks Derek From Sara CT on AM CDT To Derek NRON cc Mark UEnronXGate Mark CT Subject Re Goldman Sach repo docs Derek Gail Shanley Goldman Sachs Co in NY sent me Enron Credit Inc documents with Goldman Sachs Co Enron Credit Limited will be dealing with Goldman Sachs International in London Ill try to find out who the London lawyer is and have the docs sent to Denis OConnell who is the lawyer for Enron Credit Limited Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Derek NRON AM To Sara CT cc Subject Re Goldman Sach repo docs Sara it is between ECL and GS Co but GS s Gail shandley sent over the docs to you
